txt_en: I celebrate myself, and sing myself.
txt_cn: 我为自己欢庆，为自己歌唱。
author: Walt Whitman

txt_en: Sometimes you gotta get through your fears to see the beauty on the other side.
txt_cn: 有时候，你要克服内心的恐惧，才能看见彼端的美景。
author: 《恐龙当家》

txt_en: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
txt_cn: 你必须先见到很棒的自己，才能做出很棒的事。
author: 迈克尔·乔丹

txt_en: When all else is lost, the future still remains.
txt_cn: 即使失去一切，未来仍在。
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

txt_en: Wisdom is the power to put our time and our knowledge to the proper use.
txt_cn: 所谓智慧，就是合理利用好我们的时间和知识。
author: Thomas J. Watson

txt_en: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
txt_cn: 当我们努力发掘他人的好时，我们往往也会看到自己最好的一面。
author: William Arthur Ward

txt_en: Being brave means knowing that when you fail, you don't fail forever.
txt_cn: 勇敢就是知道即使你失败了，你也不是永远失败。
author: Lana Del Rey

txt_en: We are the hero of our own story.
txt_cn: 我们都是我们自己故事里的英雄。
author: Mary McCarthy

txt_en: Promise yourself to be so strong that nothing can disturb your peace of mind.
txt_cn: 对自己承诺：要强大到任何事情都无法破坏你内心的平和。 ​​​​
author: Christian D. Larson

txt_en: An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding.
txt_cn: 生活的目标，是唯一值得我们去寻找的财富。
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

txt_en: Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal.
txt_cn: 没有人意识到，有些人花了大量的精力就只是为了做个平常人。
author: 阿尔贝·加缪

txt_en: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
txt_cn: 我们的命运是由自己，而不是天上的星星掌握。
author: 威廉·莎士比亚
